newsitem.title: UK: NWE jet fuel strenghtens, premiums steady.
newsitem.headline: NWE jet fuel strenghtens, premiums steady.

text.p: NWE jet fuel prices were stronger as benchmark futures recovered from recent losses and premiums retained higher levels, traders said.
A cargo was offered at Sept IPE +$26 fob NWE but traders assessed premiums closer to Sept IPE +$24/+$25. Two parties, however, were reported to be looking for a cargo.
On the cif cargo market premiums were assessed at Sept IPE +$33/+35, cif NWE per tonne.
On the barge market, premiums were also firm at Sept IPE +$22/+$23.
